thread.title: Kendall and Kylie Jenner wear Balmain x H&M at launch event
thread.title_full: Kendall and Kylie Jenner wear Balmain x H&M at launch event | Examiner.com

author: Shani Harris
title: Kendall and Kylie Jenner wear Balmain x H&M at launch event
text:
Play ‪Balmain x H&M event in NY‬ H&M Kendall Jenner and Kylie Jenner wore looks from the upcoming Balmain x H&M collection at the launch party on Tuesday, Oct 20 . Kendall was dressed head-to-toe in pieces from the cost friendly line. The model wore a top, jacket, belt and draped pants on the red carpet. She accessorized with a gold choker and Francesco Russo sandals. Kylie Jenner showed off her curvy figure in a bodycon Balmain dress, belt and thigh high boots.
Photo by Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for H&M View all 18 photos Creative director Olivier Rousteing joined members of the Balmain Army which includes Gigi Hadid and Jourdann Dunn on the carpet before the models walked the runway. The highly anticipated Balmain womenswear collection includes the definitive Balmain silhouette. The Parisian based label features graphic elements, metallic thread detailing and some items that are embossed with the Balmain insignia. “This is for the new H&M Balmain Nation – a complete collection that can be worn by many different women on different continents, all part of the same world. I wanted to stay true to the DNA of Balmain: richly detailed, powerful and yet effortless,” says Olivier Rousteing, creative director.
The launch party included models like Kendall Jenner, Bella Hadid, Joan Smalls, Karlie Kloss, Alessandra Ambrosio and Toni Garrn. The beauties who showed off looks like velvet blazers, sequin dresses, biker jackets, pants and mini skirts which are quintessential Balmain on the catwalk. Alexa Chung, Diane Kruger, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Lewis hamilton and other VIP's partied the night away after the show when he Backstreet Boys performed a live concert to entertain the crowd. The Wall Street event was made available via a livestream on Periscope . Checkout highlights from the runway show and concert.
Kendall shared a message about her Balmain x H&M campaign shoot prior to the show on Instagram . "Flashback to shooting ‪#HMBalmaination‬. practicing a little twerk." Fashionistas will have to wait for the line to hit stores and online at H&M on November 5 . A Balmain x H&M fragrance scented with white jasmine, musk and sandalwood will also be made available worldwide in December.
